title: What does Barbara Kruger use?
content:
Is this Helvetica? (I'm new to type!)

Thanks!

author: c.gray

comments.content: Thanks! Futura Extra Black or Futura Heavy? Can't tell.
Yes, you are totally right! Perfect! Thanks!

I'm also wondering if anyone can suggest fonts that match the fonts seen in this image?
